div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1607 Jericho, Judaea, 1965-1966 Burial: c. 100 B.C. Contents: 200+ AR Antiochus VII: 44+ tetradr.; 3+ didr. (Tyre) Demetrius II, 2nd reign: 52+ tetradr.; 1+ didr. (Tyre) Cleopatra Thea and Antiochus VIII: 1+ tetradr. of Ascalon Antiochus VIII: 3+ tetradr. (Ace [1+ Attic weight]; Ascalon [2+]) Tyre: 5+ tetradr. (latest yr. 24 = 103/2 B.C.) Disposition: Amman 44; A. Spaer, Jerusa- lem 65 Spaer, NC 1970, pp. 23-8, illus.
